price: 152. Taigi, prisiminkite Mane (melsdamiesi, šlovindami), Aš prisiminsiu jus. Ir būkite dėkingi Man (už Mano nesuskaičiuojamas Malones jums) ir nebūkite Man nedėkingi.
arabic: فَٱذۡكُرُونِيٓ أَذۡكُرۡكُمۡ وَٱشۡكُرُواْ لِي وَلَا تَكۡفُرُونِ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fa-udh'kurūnī adhkur'kum wa-ush'kurū lī walā takfurūni
